message: We are working on iphone application and having an argument on whether it's time to discount iOS 3 support. It's rather difficult to test on the device because we don't have one in reach. So what do you think guys, does it still make sense to support OS3? Is there any analytics on market share between os versions anyone of you aware of?
Found this article on stackoverflow so far: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4242606/how-many-units-of-each-ios-version-are-currently-in-usage
Cocos2d, a commonly used game engine, is dropping 3.x support. Apple is dropping support for the 2nd-gen hardware with 4.3.
now? although, put a warning in the app description...
2nd thought, depends on your app? is it so hardware intensive that you'll spend too much time making the app work on older device? then yeah now...
